attrs.name: data
attrs.desc: Set the data of the favorites menu.

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Customize the icon for expanding and collapsing a node.

attrs.name: max-item
attrs.desc: Set the maximum number of columns that can be added to favorites.

attrs.name: titile
attrs.desc: Set the title of the favorites menu. The default value is null.

attrs.name: default-expand-all
attrs.desc: Whether to expand all nodes by default when a menu pop-up window is opened. The default value is true.

attrs.name: ellipsis
attrs.desc: Omitted if the menu content is too long. The default value is true.

attrs.name: wrap
attrs.desc: The menu content is displayed in a new line when it is too long. The default value is false.

attrs.name: keep-selected-nodes
attrs.desc: Whether to retain the status of the selected content after selecting content in the tree node, clicking Cancel, and opening the dialog box again. The default value is true.

attrs.name: get-menu-data-sync
attrs.desc: User-defined menu data service. Data is directly returned.

slots.name: foot
slots.desc: Slot at the bottom of the menu pop-up window

methods.name: sureNodevalue
methods.desc: Obtains the selected menu node, closes the menu pop-up window, and displays the selected menu.
